description: Gets a project in Amazon DataZone.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the project exists.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the project was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon DataZone user who created the project.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the project.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the project exists.

nested_items.name: domainUnitId
nested_items.description: The ID of the domain unit.

nested_items.name: environmentDeploymentDetails
nested_items.description: The environment deployment status of a project.

nested_items.description: Environment failure reasons.
